Introduction

Boo Seungkwan is a South Korean singer, dancer, songwriter, composer and TV personality under Pledis Entertainment. He is the main vocalist of the boy group SEVENTEEN. He is also a member of the group's vocal unit and the sub-unit BSS (Booseoksoon). Aside from his vocal prowess, Seungkwan is also known for his funny and cheerful personality which is showcased through his participation in variety shows such as "Amazing Saturday" and "Racket Boys". In 2018, he received a Rookie Entertainer Award.

Seungkwan made his official debut as a member of SEVENTEEN on May 26, 2015 with the mini-album 17 Carat.
